./.title: Introduction
./.body:
Bandwidth Design System CDN
Add this line of code into the  of your application and you're off! Just add the HTML code, with the classes that are on the right side of each component, and you will have the Bandwidth style!


Run Locally
To run the design system locally:
Prereqs

Git
Node & NPM
Python v2.7.*

1. Install gitbook-cli
npm install -g gitbook-cli

2. Clone Design System:
git clone https://github.com/Bandwidth/design-system.git

3. Change folder to design-system
cd design-system

4. Build The Design system
make

5. Serve the Design system
make serve
